ARABIC: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So do not try to hasten their punishment. We are simply counting out the number of their days.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, do not be hasty with them. We are counting their number (of days).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therefore, do not hasten (in seeking a scourge against them). We are counting their days.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), exercise patience; We have given them respite only for an appointed time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So do not be impatient for them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); We are only completing their number.* (* The number of days left for them or their evil deeds.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So make no haste against them; We only count out to them a (limited) number.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore be not in haste against them, We only number out to them a number (of days).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So hasten thou not against them; We are only numbering for them a number.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So make no haste against them (O Muhammad). We do but number unto them a sum (of days).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So take no hasty action against them; their days are numbered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So hasten thou not against them; We are only counting against them a counting. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not make haste against them; indeed We are counting for them, a counting [down].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So make no haste against them, for We but count out to them a (limited) number (of days).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So make no haste against them; We only count out to them a (limited) number (of the days of the life of this world and delay their term so that they may increase in evil and sins).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, do not hasten (things) against them, for We count out to them a number,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So do not hurry against them. We are counting for them a countdown.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:84] So do not make haste against them, to demand [that they receive] chastisement. Indeed We are only counting for them, the days and the nights, or [their] every breath, carefully, until the time [arrives] for their chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So make no haste against them (0 Muhammad)) do not hasten chastisement upon them. (We do but number unto them a sum) one breath after another.
